columns.text:
Pearl Suite
With 25 guest rooms and a great variety of room types to choose from. Standard amenities in all rooms include central air-conditioning / heating, private bath, cable / satellite flat screen TV, music, direct dial telephone, refrigerator, hair dryer, shaver plug, coffee & tea courtesy tray, free wireless.
Up to 4 guests are allowed

items.title: Foivos Suite
items.description: This suite is the essence of luxury with its seemingly Infinity Private Swimming Pool equipped with hydro massage jets and its private outdoor heated Jacuzzi. Relax in the sun on the plush loungers by day, and on the candle lit terrace of Foivos at dusk.
items.excerpt: This suite is the essence of luxury with its seemingly Infinity Private Swimming Pool equipped with hydro massage jets and its private outdoor heated Jacuzzi. Relax in the sun on the plush loungers by day, and on the candle lit terrace of Foivos at dusk.
items.amenities:
• Private and infinity fresh water swimming pool
  • Private outdoor heated Jacuzzi
  • Private sea view terrace with sun loungers, chairs and table
  • Two Bedrooms, one with king size and one with queen size beds
  • Natural full latex mattresses 22cm height
  • Luxury cotton satin bed linens
  • Microfibers duvet
  • Pillow menu
  • Two bathrooms with couple-sized shower  decorated with Venetian stucco and glass mosaics
  • Signature Bathroom amenities
  • Beauty care set upon arrival
  • Fluffy Bathrobes, slippers and sandals
  • Hairdryer and lady’s vanity unit
  • Oil room vaporizers with guest selected fragrances
  • Pool and Beach towels in a beach bag
  • Individually controlled Air condition
  • Individually controlled Heating
  • Secured windows and French door with sound/cool/heat proof double glass
  • Direct dial telephone
  • Safe Box
  • Working desk
  • Audio Visual includes: Personal Laptop, Free Wi-Fi internet access, LCD TV Satellite channels, DVD/CD/ Radio/Mp3 player, iPod charger & speakers/cell phone ( upon arrival )
  • Fully stocked minibar with complimentary bottles of water
  • Nespresso tea and coffee maker
  • Twice daily maid service
  • Iron, ironing boards
  • Baby cot free of charge
  • A-la-carte American Champagne breakfast served in your own balcony

items.title: Armonia Suite
items.description: This Suite is a paradise consisting of a plush living room with two built-in sofa beds, a separate bedroom with a king size bed, an old traditional kitchenette and a really impressive oversized en suite green bathroom. Treat yourself by enjoying a paradise cocktail from within your private Infinity Swimming Pool embedded on the exquisite terrace.

items.title: Nefeli Suite
items.description: Decorated in Aegean hues, this Suite comprises a panoramic patio with an outdoor heated Jacuzzi overlooking the sea – just for two. Romantically lit by lanterns, it is the ideal place to sip a glass of chilled sparkling wine as the day slips into night and the sunset colors fill the sky.
